EmailTemplate.description: MSPRE21 SUPER REAL ESTATE AGENT AWARD
EmailTemplate.name: . RE SUPER AGENT DL DAY
EmailTemplate.subject: Link to your 2022 Super Agent award form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Deadline day is Thursday, June 9, 2022 to complete your candidate form for the 2022 Super Real Estate Agent™ award.
To be considered this year, you must submit additional information about your business practice. Candidates must meet minimum experience and production criteria. Your response is required by, Thursday June 9, 2022 to ensure you are considered for this year’s recognition.
To access and complete your evaluation form, click on this link: {!Opportunity.Research_Form_URL__c} , and enter your code: {!Opportunity.Research_Stage__c} (The code is key sensitive) If the link to the survey does not work, simply copy and paste the link into a web URL and click "enter"
If selected as an award winner, you will receive information on how you can leverage this honor through an expanded profile. Again, congratulations on being identified as a candidate for the 2022 Super Real Estate Agent™ award.
Please contact us at 651-259-1107, if you have questions or need help.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name}
Crescendo Business Services 2117 Cliff Dr Eagan, MN 55122 Direct: 651-259-1865 debbie.noll@fivestarprofessional.com
unsubscribe from this list
